titleStmt.title: Religous principles in verse. Verses made by a maid under 14. Of Christ crucified.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Woodnothe, next door to the Golden-heart in Leaden-hall street,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 24"; the 8 in the imprint date is crossed out and "7" written in; [p. 5] "believe repent. thou - thy ransom's payd.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Richard Woodnothe, next door to the Golden-heart
